front.title: Survey of Domain Verification Techniques using DNS

abstract.t: Many services on the Internet need to verify ownership or control of domains in the Domain Name System (DNS) [RFC1034] [RFC1035]. This verification often relies on adding or editing DNS records within the domain. This document surveys various techniques in wide use today, the pros and cons of each, and possible improvements. Discussion Venues This note is to be removed before publishing as an RFC. Source for this draft and an issue tracker can be found at https://github.com/ShivanKaul/draft-sahib-domain-verification- techniques.
